description: Test suite for VueTemplate project initialization, configuration loading, and script execution within the universalinit package.

methods.name: test_vue_init_info
methods.description: Verifies that the VueTemplate provides correct initial configuration info.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the project initialization process, including directory structure and content replacement.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Ensures that the post-processing script runs and creates a marker file.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Checks loading of project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Validates that template variables in files are correctly replaced with project info.
